title: Water Observations from Space
description: Water Observations from Space (WOfS) provides surface water observations derived from satellite imagery for all of Australia from 1986 to the present. The WOfS product allows users to get a better understanding of where water is normally present in a landscape, where water is seldom observed, and where inundation has occurred occasionally. WOfS displays the detected surface water from cloud-free Landsat observations for the whole of Australia.
